title: Allow usage of HyphenationCompoundWordTokenFilter without dictionary
description: We should allow to use the HyphenationCompoundWordTokenFilter without a dictionary. This produces a lot of "nonword" tokens but might be useful sometimes.

comments.content:
I think this is a nice feature.

I see some interesting hyphenation-only results presented here:
http://lwa09.informatik.tu-darmstadt.de/pub/IR/WebHome/wir2009_leveling.pdf

I updated your patch to trunk, I would like to commit to trunk/3x in a few days if no one objects.
comments.author: Robert Muir
